mapper.insert: insert into users(id, pw, name, nickName, role, addr, email, tel, birth, gender, preferPace, status) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{role}, #{addr}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{preferPace}, #{status})
mapper.select: select id, name from users where id = #{param1} and pw = #{param2}
select count(id) cnt from users where=#{param1}
